extendedInfo.description: Race the flood of water to connect the pipes before it leaks in this fast-paced, addicting and challenging puzzle game.- 4 difficulty modes to test your skills- 2 full themes- Save your game and return later- Online scoreboard to compare your progress with the worldLike Plants vs. Zombies or Angry Birds; get this!

reviews.comment: Great game but the full versn play area is 2low, can\'t c the nxt pieces,undo or faucet butns. Free versn fits great on my Hero.Refunded until fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t just force close, it makes my phone shut down and restart. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I bought the upgrade but continue to play the free version. It\'s much easier to see the pipes when they don\'t take up the entire square.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this game! Brings me back to the Windows 95 days...

reviews.comment: Interesting but need to improve on selection option. Works on X10. Excellent

reviews.comment: Will.not fix Does not work on Droid x with Froyo. You do not get the piece pictured when you place it on the board. Please fix. Feel ripped off.

reviews.comment: Would get five if it were not so easy to hit the tap instead of undo.

reviews.comment: Very much impossible to play. The pipes don\'t match what you are posting into the map half the time. Droid x

reviews.comment: Love the game. Would be 5 stars if there was personal top score list - not on line. Very hard to keep track of your own scores.

reviews.comment: When i hit the screen it puts two pipes lowering my score...moto droid 2, uninstalling
